【考法 1】 v. 遮蔽： to shut off from sight; screen
【例】 shrouded the fact that the child had been adopted 将孩子是领养的这个事实隐藏起来
【近】 belie, blanket, cloak, conceal, cover, curtain, disguise, mask, occult, screen, veil, blot out, paper over
【反】 bare, disclose, display, divulge, expose, reveal, show 展示，暴露
【考法 2】 n. 隐蔽物： something that conceals, protects, or screens:
【例】 under a shroud of fog 在迷雾的掩护下
【记】 音：尸绕的，尸体上缠绕的裹尸布；音: 烧的，包裹起来烧的，裹尸布
